sentences.en: A new house of any size was now almost invariably symmetrical.
sentences.cn: 现在新建的房子不管大小几乎都是对称的.

sentences.en: Emphasize backswing with your arms and stay smooth and symmetrical.
sentences.cn: 强调双臂后摆,保持流畅和协调.

sentences.en: Folds may be gentle and symmetrical, or sharp and asymmetrical.
sentences.cn: 褶皱可以是平缓而对称的, 也可以是陡峭而非对称的.

sentences.en: If a symmetrical matrix is positive definite, the determinants of all its minors are also positive.
sentences.cn: 如果对称矩阵是为正定者, 它的所有子式的行列式也都是正的.

sentences.en: In reality, you know that our bodies are not totally symmetrical.
sentences.cn: 但事实上, 我们的身体不是全部对称的.
通货膨胀和通货紧缩是对称的名词.

sentences.en: Liquid water can assume only a single symmetrical shape.
sentences.cn: 液态水只能有一种对称形状.

sentences.en: Symmetrical instability and sideways instability are the two modes of in - plane instability.
sentences.cn: 平面内失稳的类型主要有对称失稳和侧移失稳两种.

sentences.en: Symmetrical may use the absolute symmetry and the relative symmetry.
sentences.cn: 对称可采用绝对对称和相对对称.

sentences.en: The fluid cavity should be smooth, continuous, and symmetrical to minimize fluid torque.
sentences.cn: 为了减省液体力矩,液体腔应该是光滑的, 连续的和对称的.

sentences.en: The laws of physics are symmetrical for translational displacements.
sentences.cn: 物理定律对平移是对称的.

sentences.en: The symmetrical design of this church makes it very beautiful.
sentences.cn: 这座教堂的对称性结构使它十分美丽.

sentences.en: The two wings of the building are exactly symmetrical.
This problem can be avoided by using three components which produce a skew symmetrical path curve.
sentences.cn: 使用三块能产生反对称形路径曲线的元件,即可避免上述问题.

sentences.en: We note that the structure is symmetrical and that sways represent antisymmetrical loading.
sentences.cn: 注意结构是对称的,而节点线位移表示反对称荷载.

trans.tran_en: (of a body, a design, an object, etc.) having two halves, parts or sides that are the same in size and shape
